EmailTemplate.subject: RE: Top 5 (1338580684.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - - Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Chilli, I head back from marketing, we don’t have a list of trade shows and publications per say. There are a number of different trade shows happening all the time, I would just google what is in your local area. If you sign up for our Independent Consulting Brief that will keep you in the know as well. You can do that here http://www.mbopartners.com/independent-consulting-brief <http://www.mbopartners.com/independent-consulting-brief>. Some publications that I enjoy are: http://www.openforum.com/ <http://www.openforum.com/>http://hbr.org/ <http://hbr.org/>http://www.entrepreneur.com/magazine/index.html <http://www.entrepreneur.com/magazine/index.html>http://forums.evancarmichael.com/index.php?sid=dc3ff4f534daf8668dd9b53fa087eed9 <http://forums.evancarmichael.com/index.php?sid=dc3ff4f534daf8668dd9b53fa087eed9> Some books that I have enjoyed are: http://books.google.com/books/about/Start_Your_Own_Consulting_Business_Third.html?id=NeAmkhGpDGAC <http://books.google.com/books/about/Start_Your_Own_Consulting_Business_Third.html?id=NeAmkhGpDGAC> http://www.amazon.com/Days-Success-Consulting-William-McKnight/dp/1435454421 <http://www.amazon.com/Days-Success-Consulting-William-McKnight/dp/1435454421> http://books.google.com/books/about/Value_Based_Fees.html?id=SmCXBSFQPGQC <http://books.google.com/books/about/Value_Based_Fees.html?id=SmCXBSFQPGQC> I hope this helps! Thanks, Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Chilli [mailto:customercare@vortexchillers.com] Sent: Thursday, May 31, 2012 7:27 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: RE: Top 5 Also, do you think I could get that list of trade shows and the publications please? Thanks again, Advice For the Digital AgeChilli Schockwww.smartmarketadvice.com <http://www.smartmarketadvice.com/>(805) 931-6655110 S. Mary Ave St2, #127Nipomo Ca 93444 From: Sara Conde [mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com] <mailto:[mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com]> Sent: Thursday, May 31, 2012 3:21 PM To: Chilli Subject: RE: Top 5 Hi Chilli, I completely understand. I will do my best to answer your questions via email. I think a good place to start is by sharing my personal information page which you can view by by going here. <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://info.mbopartners.com/advisor-info-s-conde.html?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCeERKoUh77u6aI7vovyPPaIyto791APvq190tl0txf4alUg%3D%3D> This will give a much more detailed breakdown of our services and has information you can not find on our site. Pelase review and feel free to email me with any questions. To answer your first question, our fee is 5% off the top of each invoice taken off pre-tax (like a busieness expense.) It reduces to 1.5% when we receive 125k in gross billings and then re-sets to 5% every anniversery year. This cycle continues an repeates. The only way MBO get’s paid is when you get paid, there are no costs to sign up, take us to another contract, close the account etc. Thank you,Sara___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCeERKoUh77u6aI7vovyPPaIyto791APvq190tl0txf4alUg%3D%3D>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCeERKoUh77u6aI7vovyPPaIyto791APvq190tl0txf4alUg%3D%3D> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCeERKoUh77u6aI7vovyPPaIyto791APvq190tl0txf4alUg%3D%3D> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Chilli [mailto:customercare@vortexchillers.com] <mailto:[mailto:customercare@vortexchillers.com]> Sent: Thursday, May 31, 2012 3:25 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: RE: Top 5 I did check out your links and see that your company is in business to take care of paperwork etc for self employed consultants such as myself. I did not, however, find any reference to what those services really cover and what the costs are for them. I am the type of person who prefers economy of word and therefor am keen on email rather than the time-consuming nature of phone calls. If you can answer my questions in this medium, I would appreciate it. Thanks in advance, Advice For the Digital AgeChilli Schockwww.smartmarketadvice.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.smartmarketadvice.com/?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCeERKoUh77u6aI7vovyPPaIyto791APvq190tl0txf4alUg%3D%3D>(805) 931-6655110 S. Mary Ave St2, #127Nipomo Ca 93444 From: Sara Conde [mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com] <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:%5bmailto:sconde@mbopartners.com%5d?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCeERKoUh77u6aI7vovyPPaIyto791APvq190tl0txf4alUg%3D%3D> Sent: Thursday, May 31, 2012 11:25 AM To: Steve Arhancet; Chilli Subject: RE: Top 5 Hi Chilli, Nice to meet you via email! I wanted to introduce myself as the person at MBO Partners responsible for all new associate and partnership requests. I’ll be your main point of contact to provide you an overview of our services and answer any specific questions you may have. You may easily book a time that is convenient for you on my online schedule by going here <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&https://my.timedriver.com/8SLYS?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCeERKoUh77u6aI7vovyPPaIyto791APvq190tl0txf4alUg%3D%3D>. You can also watch a short video about who we are on You Tube <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://youtu.be/zKDzwSTmGv4?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCeERKoUh77u6aI7vovyPPaIyto791APvq190tl0txf4alUg%3D%3D>. I look forward to speaking with you and sharing more information about MBO Partners! Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCaFBLvUZ46PmNAqTvkCXBaIymvq5uR%2FTp36VUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D&mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCeERKoUh77u6aI7vovyPPaIyto791APvq190tl0txf4alUg%3D%3D>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCeERKoUh77u6aI7vovyPPaIyto791APvq190tl0txf4alUg%3D%3D> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCaFBLvUZ46PmNAqTvkCXBaIymvq5uR%2FTp36VUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D&mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCeERKoUh77u6aI7vovyPPaIyto791APvq190tl0txf4alUg%3D%3D> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Steve Arhancet Sent: Thursday, May 31, 2012 2:03 PM To: Chilli Cc: Sara Conde Subject: RE: Top 5 Chilli, There are a number of tradeshows. I actually think there is a small business tradeshow that’s coming up in DC. You can also sign up for our Independent Consulting Brief. It talks about everything you should be ‘in-the-know’ about regarding consulting or starting your own consulting company. I would like to introduce you to Sara who you can chat with about what’s out there and how to get started. Sara, Can you please reach out to Chilli and talk about all the resources that are out there for new IC’s? Steve From: Chilli [mailto:customercare@vortexchillers.com] <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:%5bmailto:customercare@vortexchillers.com%5d?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCaFBLvUZ46PmNAqTvkCXBaIymvq5uR%2FTp36VUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D&mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCeERKoUh77u6aI7vovyPPaIyto791APvq190tl0txf4alUg%3D%3D> Sent: Thursday, May 31, 2012 12:27 PM To: Steve Arhancet Subject: RE: Top 5 Thank you Steve! Do you know of any publications I could be subscribed to for the industry? Also, I am hoping to find a good small business consulting trade show or convention to attend where I could get a clearer idea of how to shape my new consulting business. Any suggestions? Thanks again, Advice For the Digital AgeChilli Schockwww.smartmarketadvice.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.smartmarketadvice.com/?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCeERKoUh77u6aI7vovyPPaIyto791APvq190tl0txf4alUg%3D%3D>(805) 931-6655110 S. Mary Ave St2, #127Nipomo Ca 93444 From: Steve Arhancet [mailto:sarhancet@mbopartners.com] <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:%5bmailto:sarhancet@mbopartners.com%5d?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCaFBLvUZ46PmNAqTvkCXBaIymvq5uR%2FTp36VUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D&mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCeERKoUh77u6aI7vovyPPaIyto791APvq190tl0txf4alUg%3D%3D> Sent: Thursday, May 31, 2012 6:48 AM To: Chilli Subject: RE: Top 5 All the data and contracts are all available here on our private links. http://info.mbopartners.com/advisor-info-s-arhancet.html <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://info.mbopartners.com/advisor-info-s-arhancet.html?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCeERKoUh77u6aI7vovyPPaIyto791APvq190tl0txf4alUg%3D%3D> Regards, Steve From: Chilli [mailto:customercare@vortexchillers.com] <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:%5bmailto:customercare@vortexchillers.com%5d?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCaFBLvUZ46PmNAqTvkCXBaIymvq5uR%2FTp36VUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D&mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCeERKoUh77u6aI7vovyPPaIyto791APvq190tl0txf4alUg%3D%3D> Sent: Wednesday, May 30, 2012 6:20 PM To: Steve Arhancet Subject: Top 5 I just listened to your Top 5 webinar and at the end you offered to send example contracts for the different type work you offer to your consult customers. May I ask for these examples? Thanks in advance.
